name: Ecigator
tag_list: electronic-cigarette, ecig, eliquid, ejuice, vape, vaping, vaporizer
overview:
Shenzhen Ecigator Ouhai Co., Ltd is a subsidiary company of GiftSoar, Located in Shenzhen, China, who is engaging in R&D, produce and sale of electronic cigarettes and e-liquid. Many wholesalers overseas have been cooperating with us on the processing & marketing of our products.

We ONLY produce and sell High Quality Electronic Cigarette, our main products including: personal vaporizer electronic cigarette device, CE4, CE4+, CE5, CE5+, CE6, CE7, CE8, CE9 and vivi nova clearomizer, variable voltage ecig, ego-C twist, Vamo VV Mod, Itaste VV, Lavatube Ecig, Elips LSK-T, Portable Dry Herb Vaporizer, etc.

The company executes strict quality management system. We have the professional quality inspectors in our company. Our technicians will customize very detailed technological process of production before mass production. And all products will be inspected by our professional quality inspectors before they packed and delivered.

Your OEM & ODM requirement of E-cigarette is welcomed.
